data.speaker: Player
data.content: I can't keep running away... I know what I did...  I have to accept it and ... move on...

data.speaker: Monster
data.content: You can't! I HATE YOU! YOU HATE YOURSELF!

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I do... I think I always will... How can I possibly forget what I've done?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: But... there might be someone out there... If I give up now... Why am I still alive?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Time... to wake up at last...
